parts.str: For whom are you filling in this survey?

NOTE: If you are filling in the survey on behalf of someone else, then make sure that you have the consent of that person to do so. Please answer all questions as if you were the person you are filling this in for.
What is your date of birth (month and year)?
What is the first part of your home postcode (the part before the space)?
What is the first part of your school/college/workplace postcode? (Where you spend the majority of your work/study time)
Not applicable (e.g. don't have a fixed workplace)
Which of the following descriptions most closely matches with your main occupation?
Professional (e.g. manager, doctor, teacher, nurse, engineer)
Office work (e.g. admin, finance assistant, receptionist)
Retail, sales, catering and hospitality and leisure (e.g. shop assistant, waiter, bar-staff, gym instructor)
Skilled manual worker (e.g. mechanic, electrician, technician)
Other manual work (e.g. cleaning, security, driver)
What is the highest level of formal education/qualification that you have?
A-levels or equivalent (e.g. Higher, NVQ Level3, BTEC)
Higher Degree or equivalent (e.g. Master's Degree, PGCE, PhD, Medical Doctorate, Advanced Professional Award)
Except people you meet on public transport, do you have contact with any of the following during the course of a typical day? (Select all options that apply, if any)
More than 10 children or teenagers over the course of the day
More than 10 people aged over 65 over the course of day
Groups of people (more than 10 individuals at any one time)
INCLUDING YOU, how many people in each of the following age groups live in your household?
How many of the children in your household go to school or day-care?
What is your main means of transport?
On a normal day, how much time do you spend on public transport? (Bus, train, tube etc.)
How often do you have common colds or flu-like diseases?
Did you receive a flu vaccine during the last autumn/winter season? (2017-2018)
Have you received a flu vaccine this autumn/winter season? (2018-2019)
When were you vaccinated this flu season? (2017-2018)
Please state where you were vaccinated.
Please state the type of vaccine you received.
What were your reasons for getting a seasonal influenza vaccination this year? (Select all options that apply)
I belong to a risk group (e.g, pregnant, over 65, underlying health condition, etc)
Vaccination decreases my risk of getting influenza
Vaccination decreases the risk of spreading influenza to others
It was given to me at my school
It was recommended in my workplace
The vaccine was readily available and vaccine administration was convenient
I don't want to miss work/school
What were your reasons for NOT getting a seasonal influenza vaccination this year? (Select all options that apply)
I am planning to be vaccinated, but haven't been yet
I haven't been offered the vaccine
I don't belong to a risk group
It is better to build your own natural immunity against influenza
I doubt that the influenza vaccine is effective
I don't think I am likely to get influenza
I believe that influenza vaccine can cause influenza
I am worried that the vaccine is not safe or will cause illness or other adverse events
The vaccine is not readily available to me
The vaccine is not free of charge
Although my doctor recommended a vaccine, I did not get one
Have any of your household members received a flu vaccine this autumn/winter season? (2017-2018)?
Of your household members who received a flu vaccine in 2017/18 how many are in the following age categories?
Of your household members who were vaccinated in 2017/18, please state the type of vaccine they received.
Do you take regular medication for any of the following medical conditions? (Select all options that apply)
Chronic lung disorder besides asthma e.g. COPD, emphysema, or other disorders that affect your breathing
An immunocompromising condition (e.g. splenectomy, organ transplant, acquired immune deficiency, cancer treatment)
Which trimester of the pregnancy are you in?
Yes, daily, fewer than 10 times a day
Yes, daily, 10 or more times a day
Do you have any of the following allergies that can cause respiratory symptoms? (Select all options that apply)
Allergy against domestic animals or pets
Other allergies that cause respiratory symptoms (e.g. sneezing, runny eyes)
I do not have an allergy that causes respiratory symptoms
Do you follow a special diet? (Select all options that apply)

During a normal week, how many hours do you spend doing activities that need VIGOROUS effort, making you breathe hard (for example, running, fast cycling, martial arts, competitive sports, running on a playground)?
Between one and two and a half hours
Between two and a half to three hours

During a normal week, how many hours  do you spend doing activities that need MODERATE effort, making you somewhat short of breath (for example, fast walking, light jogging, relaxed cycle to school/work, gardening)?
Between one and two and a half hours
Between two and a half to three hours
Where do you do most of your activities during the winter?
A combination of indoors and outdoors
Do you have pets at home? (Select all options that apply)
Yes, one or more other animals
Where did you first hear about the flusurvey?
In the newspaper or in a magazine
Via an internet site (search engine or link)
What is the username of the person who recommended you?
Do you use a smart phone?
Would you be willing to take part in a self-swabbing exercise this flu season?
